April 2017

I leave App Press and accept a Product Marketing position at PacketFabric.

March 2016

I wrap up consulting work and accept a Marketing Director position at App Press.

August 2015

I leave Expected Behavior to pursue more fulfilling work as a marketing consultant.

January 2012

I accept a position at Expected Behavior, in charge of product marketing and customer success.

December 2011

I leave my position as an in-house SEO at Zesco Products.

August 2009

I leave my position as an Imaging Specialist for Gannett and accept a position as an SEO at Zesco Products, an e-commerce company based in Indianapolis.

August 2007

I accept my first full time, working for Gannett as an Imaging Specialist.

December 2006

I graduate from Indiana University with a B.A. in Journalism.
